extension.summary: All FREE, No Premium Service Required
extension.description: A collection of Add-ons which uses free sources. No Debrid required.[CR] Works with Kodi Matrix and Nexus

TuneIn Radio is a free service that lets you listen to anything in the world from wherever you are. Whether you want to hear music, sports, news or current events. TuneIn Radio offers over 50,000 stations for you to choose from. From finding local stations to discovering new stations from around the world, TuneIn Radio brings you to where you want to be.

TuneIn Radio es un servicio gratuito que te permite escuchar cualquier cosa del mundo desde donde te encuentres. Si deseas escuchar música, deportes, noticias o eventos actuales. TuneIn Radio ofrece más de 50,000 estaciones radiales para escoger, desde estaciones locales hasta descubrir nuevas estaciones alrededor del mundo, TuneIn Radio te lleva a donde tu quieras estar.

Dash Radio is a digital radio broadcasting platform over 80 original stations. These stations are curated by DJs, radio personalities, musicians, and music tastemakers. The platform includes partner stations curated by Snoop Dogg, Kylie Jenner, Lil Wayne, Tech N9ne, Borgore, B-Real of Cypress Hill, and others.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not responsible for the use of this addon. The author is not responsible for the content found using this addon. The author does not host or own any content found within this addon.[CR]The author is in no way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, or the XBMC Foundation.[CR]This is a Non-profit resource, organized solely for educational purposes which is protected under the Fair-Use doctrine of the Copyright Act, Specifically section 107, which does promote freedom of expression, by permitting the unlicensed use of copyright-protected works.

extension.summary: Watch thousands of free videos and movies from the Internet Archive
extension.description: Internet Archive is a non-profit digital library. Choose from thousands of digital movies uploaded by Archive users which range from classic full-length films, to daily alternative news broadcasts, to cartoons and concerts. *Matrix Version*
extension.disclaimer: Support provided at forum.kodi.tv or via my github. I will not provide support at TVaddons, or any other forum. Please provide a full, unedited, debug log when requesting support.

extension.summary: PowerNation TV is the source of how-to television for auto enthusiasts.
extension.description: PowerNation TV brings you in-depth how-to shows to cater to your automotive interests, featuring Xtreme Off-Road, Detroit Muscle, Truck Tech, Engine Power and more! Currently this add-on provides access to the free episodes only. *Matrix Version*
extension.disclaimer: For support go to my github. No support without a full, unedited debug log. No support at TVAddons or any other forum.
extension.news: Version 2022.03.04 - Fixed missing dependency in addon.xml file.

extension.description: Quest is a 24/7 broadcast television network that entertains and informs its viewers with exhilarating adventure programming about nature's greatest dangers, history's greatest mysteries and man's greatest achievements. *Matrix Version*
extension.disclaimer: For support go to my github. No support without a full, unedited debug log. No support at TVAddons or any other forum.

extension.description: You are tired of Youtube apikeys? And watching the videos on the platform as maximum quality only up to 720p? [CR] Well, it's over! From our bar we present a new YouTube addon, where no APIKEY is needed, nor is there any kind of restriction to watch the videos at the highest quality offered, 720p, 1080p, 2K and 4K![CR]All this and much more plus...

Hasta las narices de las apikeys de YouTube? Y de ver como calidad máxima los videos de la plataforma solo hasta 720p?[CR]Pues se acabó! Desde nuestra taberna os presentamos un nuevo addon de YouTube, donde no hace falta APIKEY alguna, ni tampoco hay ningún tipo de restricción para ver los videos a la máxima calidad ofrecida, 720p, 1080p, 2K y 4K![CR]Todo esto y mucho mas...
extension.disclaimer: This is free [COLOR red][B]software[/B][/COLOR][CR][COLOR red][B]But it is not allowed[/B][/COLOR] to be distributed pre-installed on any type of device nor its total or partial inclusion in any software and/or hardware package for which the end user must [COLOR red][B]pay or make a donation[/B][/COLOR], for its acquisition, for its use or for receiving assistance.[CR]If you believe that any of these rules is not being followed, please contact us.

Este es un software [COLOR red][B]gratuito[/B][/COLOR][CR][COLOR red][B]Pero no se permite[/B][/COLOR] su distribuición preinstalada en ningún tipo de dispositivo ni tampoco su inclusión total o parcial en cualquier paquete de software y/o hardware por el que el usuario final deba [COLOR red][B]pagar o hacer una donación[/B][/COLOR], por su adquisición, por su uso o por recibir asistencia.[CR]Si cree que alguna de estas normas no se está cumpliendo póngase en contacto con nosotros.
extension.news: - Añadida opción de reproducción externa de playlists[CR]- Correcciones menores
- Added option to play external playlists[CR]- Minor fixes

extension.description: Merriam-Webster definition of GRATIS: without charge or recompense : FREE!!!

extension.summary: Crackle delivers popular, award-winning TV, movies and originals. With no limit to how much you can watch across all your devices, you can binge all you want, wherever you want.
extension.description: Crackle is a video streaming distributor of original web shows, Hollywood movies, and TV shows. Founded in the early 2000s as Grouper, and rebranded in 2007, Crackle is owned by Sony Pictures Entertainment.
TV Shows and Movies from the source: www.tvseries.video[CR]If you have any problems with this add-on, it is caused by maintenance to the source website.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
